snippet: If national security policy is going to adhere to the rule of law, the White House cannot be both the judge and executioner of terror suspects.
abstract: Editorial urges Pres Obama to create special court to approve targeted killings, saying it is first step he can take if he is serious about bringing national security policy back under rule of law.
lead_paragraph: If national security policy is going to adhere to the rule of law, the White House cannot be both the judge and executioner of terror suspects.

headline.seo: A Special Court Is Needed to Review Targeted Killings
